Reviews.Title: acer missed with windows 8
Reviews.Author: Lisa Allman
Reviews.Content: Acer makes a good computer basically, but windows 8 is terrible no matter what reviews you read! I had to take it to my tech guy to be reloaded with windows 7. That cost me another almost $200. Don't buy windows 8 or 8.1!!!

Reviews.Title: Good after...
Reviews.Author: Valerie Johnson
Reviews.Content: So far this is a great computer for the price.  Touch screen is responsive.  There were some internet connectivity issues with getting thrown off regularly but since I performed Windows update it seems to be resolved.  I recommend this computer.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my needs!
Reviews.Author: Alicia Osen
Reviews.Content: note: I didn't purchase this from Amazon as I found a great cyber Monday deal elsewhere ($429 for the 6gb model).I spent literally months looking for a laptop that had everything this device offered. An optical drive (I use my laptop to watch DVDs and I also still enjoy burning CDs), a touchscreen, a sleek design, a 14-inch screen, and a reasonable price. It's darn near impossible to find 14-inch laptops with optical drives these days for prices that aren't premium. When I found this device, I felt I'd hit the jackpot.It works like a dream, looks beautiful, and has everything I needed. I have had none of the wifi issues others have mentioned.It has taken me a while to get used to the spacing on the keyboard, but I LOVE the back-lighting, which I expected to find annoying. Also, I chose the 14-inch because I have no need for a number pad and this doesn't have one.The touch-pad can take some getting used to. My previous laptop was similar though, as it only had a smooth surface rather than separate buttons for right and left clicking so it's been easy for me. I like the texture of the touch-pad because it's not shiny or slick.I do have a 6gb memory as opposed to the 4gb. The deal I found was actually for the 6gb so I didn't have to deal with any upgrading, but 6gb is good enough for me. I cant speak for how well the 4gb runs, but I would think it would be best to upgrade if you're a heavy computer user.I will recommend this laptop to anyone and everyone. If you can find it at a better price, don't worry about it seeming cheap. I was worried because of what a great deal I got that it might be cheapy and it is literally the best laptop I've used.

Reviews.Title: Damaged
Reviews.Author: Tran Nguyen
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend opened it on Christmas day and the screen was completed pitch black.  Tried a few times but did not work.  Very disappointing since it was a Christmas gift for him.  The seller wanted me to test to make sure that it doesn't work or else they would charge 20-50% fees for restocking once I send it back but I'm not a expert, I turn it on and off a few times and it still wouldn't work so there's nothing else I could've done.  They also suggested to contact the manufacturer because it's still under warranty, I wouldn't want to purchase a brand new laptop then have to go get it fixed.  Overall, I'm very upset and disappointed.  Hopefully, they can resolve the whole issue and refund me in full including the shipping cost for returning that I would have to pay for.

Reviews.Title: sharp looking laptop
Reviews.Author: Tana Dorsey
Reviews.Content: This laptop is great! It is so slim and easy to carry around, yet it has a CD ROM which is what I was specifically looking for. Nowadays if the laptop is super slim then they just eliminate the CD ROM. I do have two critiques, the touch screen works great for the most part, but can be hard to touch the small X to close a tab or other small items on the screen so I revert to the touchpad. The second is that I do tend to use the touchpad more (just more familiar with it) but sometimes it makes the cursor jump to different locations on the screen. I'm not sure if it is because the touchpad is super sensitive and detects another finger (even if it is not touching the pad) or if it is a flaw. I just deal with it though. Other than that I love the way it looks and it functions well. One more thought. I didn't realize that many computers that you buy these days do not include the full Microsoft Suite. We were lucky to have a friend who could hook us up with it, but that is an expense to consider when you are shopping around.

Reviews.Title: Great value.
Reviews.Author: Barbara L McMahan
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews before purchasing this computer.  It has met every expectation.  Great laptop for the value.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Good laptop
Reviews.Author: Sean Pratten
Reviews.Content: Bought this awhile back, has been good so far!  No real complaints.  The touch screen element is really neat and handy at times when not using the alternate browser.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop!
Reviews.Author: Richard Edstrom
Reviews.Content: Love almost everything about this laptop, One thing I am not overly excited about is the fact that it came with Window's 8.  My last computer was still running Window's XP (yes, that Acer was a dinosaur) and it is taking quite a bit of getting use to Window's 8.  One other thing that I wish it had was a Blu Ray player but that isn't that big of a deal.  I do love the graphics card in this machine that allows me to work in one program on the built-in monitor, and have an outside feed to my TV through the HDMI port (dual "screen").  It is also very quick to start up and an overall great computer so far!

Reviews.Title: bummer
Reviews.Author: E. Herrera "MeNiconSissi"
Reviews.Content: maybe it was just my luck but it got defective on me twice so had to return, Amazon saved me!! i wouldve cried if I couldnt lol. dont mean to scare anybody it worked awsome when it did, just didnt last! ;(UPDATE,Ive searched and searched and searched for another good laptop for a good price!! and no luck!, thers 2 other acer for 50-60 more and I think im going to reorder this one again! :( so heads on on a semi cheap laptop, if you want it to last, get square trade coverage here in amazon! which is what Im going to do, other wise it'll probably last me 2 years or less. Its so worth it if you dont want an expensive laptop right now! I wish these other people would answer their reviews! haha.

Reviews.Title: Acer Aspire V5-471P-6605 14-inch touchscreen
Reviews.Author: Sandra Harris-Smith
Reviews.Content: Have had this p c for 9 months paid over $600 and it is falling apart and cannot return......very disappointed and maddening.....now I get to spend hundreds of dollars for another laptop......cannot believe the lack of quality vs the money paid and short "lifespan"
